DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria 1 . Caucasian male define person European Latin American descent 2 . Healthy male 30 55 year inclusive time inform consent 3 . Body mass index ( BMI ) 18 32 kg/m2 Screening 4 . Subjects must successful vasectomy ( confirm azoospermia ) , female partner must childbearing potential must practice highly effective contraception throughout study period 30 day study drug discontinuation . No sperm donation allow study period 30 day study drug discontinuation . Exclusion Criteria 1 . Any history seizure epilepsy ( include history simple febrile seizure childhood ) disturbance consciousness likely due seizure 2 . Any medical condition , opinion investigator high risk seizure ( e.g. , history traumatic brain injury associate loss consciousness amnesia , alcohol abuse , substance abuse ) Screening within past 5 year 3 . Any history cerebrovascular disease ( stroke transient ischemic attack ) 4 . A history prolong QT/QTc interval prolonged period begin QRS complex end T wave ECG ( QT ) / QT correct heart rate use Fridericia ? formula ( QTcF ) interval ( QTcF & gt ; 450 m ) demonstrate mean triplicate electrocardiogram ( ECGs ) ( record least 1 min apart ) Screening Baseline Period 5 . Any clinically significant ECG abnormality Screening Baseline Periods , e.g . component ECG cycle onset atrial depolarization onset ventricular depolarization ( PR ) & gt ; 220 m , component ECG wave represent ventricular depolarization ( QRS ) & gt ; 110 m 6 . Hypersensitivity study drug excipients
